channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This AI Model Can Intuit How the Physical World Works
item.description: The V-JEPA system uses ordinary videos to understand the physics of the real world.

item.title: Pat Gelsinger wants to save Moore’s Law, with a little help from the Feds
item.description: The company is aiming to produce its first silicon wafers by 2028 and have its first commercial system online by 2029.

item.title: As Key Talent Abandons Apple, Meet the New Generation of Leaders Taking On the Old Guard
item.description: With “hardware guy” John Ternus as frontrunner for the next CEO, can Apple overtake its ex-employees at OpenAI and Meta?

item.title: What Are Gravel Running Shoes? (2025)
item.description: This new-ish hybrid between trail runners and road runners is designed for less technical terrain and the occasional road run.

item.title: The Best Printers for Home and Office: Brother, HP, and More
item.description: It's a boring tool, but you need one. Here are the best home printers we have tested, from ink tank to lasers.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s turned off app suggestions that look like ads
item.description: While OpenAI continues to insist that there are currently no ads — or tests for advertising — live in ChatGPT, the company’s chief research officer al...

item.title: Coinbase starts onboarding users again in India, plans for fiat on-ramp next year
item.description: Coinbase is exploring expansion into India with a staggered relaunch and hiring for different roles.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Book Lovers (2025): E-Readers, Cozy Accessories, Book Sets
item.description: Any one of these gift ideas will make your favorite bookworm very happy, from e-readers and accessories to cozy reading essentials.

item.title: Meta reportedly delays mixed reality glasses until 2027
item.description: aMeta lready sells VR headsets and Ray-Ban smart glasses, but these new glasses sound a bit different. Their format factor would reportedly be similar...

item.title: Is it time to ‘refound’ your startup?
item.description: Sometimes, founding a startup just once isn’t enough.
